Author: Decker#3767
Content: https://github.com/z-classic/node-stratum-pool/issues/39#issuecomment-436327781 - fix for pools updated. Without updated fix mining of block like this http://kmdice.explorer.dexstats.info/block/000000f19c5d5f3b0c69d787a8d669fd5256913b684fac37c91d81bc8c39494c was impossible. I saw that 183 tx stucks in mempool for a long time, when i saw this - i started my own pool and it was unable to send block with 183 txes to daemon with error "unable to decode". Now it's fixed, after applying this fix your pool software will be able to mine any txes length block.
